About Us

Who We Are, What We Stand For!

R&R Au Educational Consultancy Services, in partnership with GeSS Education, proudly introduces the first and only University Pathway in the Philippines offering in-country offshore training aligned with the Australian Qualifications Framework (AQF). Our comprehensive 6-month Aged Care training program includes an employment contract and Visa sponsorship (407/482) through our secure partner, an esteemed Australian aged care employment institution.


In partnership with R&R AU Educational Consultancy Services, GeSS Education now has an official GeSS Education Campus in Laoang City, Philippines, for offshore delivery of Australia Quality Frameworks (AQF) Certificates and Diplomas with pathways to finish your course in Australia or complete your whole qualification in the Philippines. An official collaboration with Karmelli Hospital Laoag and HomeMedix Nursing Home Services has also been confirmed providing students with the unique opportunity to complete their 120-hour work placement to gain invaluable hands-on experience and kick-start their career in aged care!

120 Hour Job Placement

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to Leah Mae Villarta, PTRP-CEO, Dr. Norman Panfilo G. Rabago, FPCP, MHCA (Internal Medicine & Hypertension Specialist),for their trust and support. Their expertise ensures our program adheres to the highest standards.
